prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Piano, Synth Lead, Strings, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Piano, Guitar, Strings, and a Synth Lead, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Strings, and a Synth Lead, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
No Bass is included in this song, but it does have Drums, Guitar, Piano, Strings, and a Synth Lead.
